name: Night of The Beholder
description:
This game is not lovecraftian, in fact, it actively disregards the tropes commonly associated with the cosmic horror genre and H.P. Lovecraft's stories.
Though, it could be classified under cosmic horror, if you look at it in a certain way. Just not 'lovecraftian' ;)

You're a low-ranking cultist in the Cult of Beholder, and yet you've just been summoned by Beholder himself. What could he want from someone like you? Prepare to find out as you follow an asshole deity in a night filled with CHILLS, THRILLS, and GENERAL SHITPOSTERY UNDER THE GUISE OF A VISUAL NOVEL.

The game has 5 endings. Hope you can get them all!

Music Credits:

This game was created for the Bad Lovecraft Games Jam.
